title: Implement Function Calling
description: Execute tool calls from AI agent responses
instructions:
Implement:
1. `calculator(operation, numbers)`: Performs math operations
   - 'add': sum all numbers
   - 'subtract': subtract from first number
   - 'multiply': multiply all numbers
   - 'divide': divide first by rest

2. `executeTool(toolName, toolInput)`: Routes to correct tool
   - If toolName is 'calculator', call calculator function
   - Return tool result
hints: Use switch or if-else for operation types
reduce() is useful for array operations
executeTool should handle unknown tools gracefully
